DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Oral Tinidazole Women With Recurrent Bacterial Vaginosis
DOC.detailed_description: This study recruit 60 woman recurrent bacterial vaginosis . These woman must current infection enrol study two infection within past 12 month . After initial screen make sure vaginal symptom due bacterial vaginosis result different infection , woman receive tinidazole ( drug similar metronidazole ) mouth 10 day . At end 10 day , patient re-examined . Those woman free bacterial vaginosis enter second phase study , half patient continue take tinidazole twice week twelve week half take medication . During time participant examine study doctor every 4 week see effective treatment prevent recurrence bacterial vaginosis . At end 12 week , woman still free bacterial vaginosis see 3 visit 3 month .
